title: fragment: CHH-4
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-source= --]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-colors= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|bg-color=rgb(255, 174, 163)
|txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
|border-color=rgb(245, 130, 115)
|label-bg-color=rgb(245, 130, 115)
|label-txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-colors= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|bg-color=rgb(135, 107, 100)
|txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
|border-color=rgb(74, 61, 58)
|label-bg-color=rgb(74, 61, 58)
|label-txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
I'm a cop.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

You notice Epon's expression. He seems displeased.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
What, not a fan of cops?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-4/F.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
Not really, no. They have a habit of falsely accusing people. And never listening to victims.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-4/C.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
...
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

You need to resurrect this conversation. You can't lose his interest.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
So, what made you try out dating apps?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-4/G.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
I got lonely.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-4/C.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
...
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-4/C.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
I was hoping to find someone that would help cure the loneliness.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

Fuck. You can still save this.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
We should totally see each other again.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-4/C.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
...
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-4/C.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
Maybe.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

Maybe? This was bad. You are Ridar Montemayor. Everyone should want you, including this twerp.

What do you do?

[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/capture-hi-s-heart-m/offset/6 | Ask to go back to his place]]]

[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/capture-hi-s-heart-m/offset/7 | Ask to meet again]]]
author: Mew-ltiverse
